channel.title: My monsters won't drop anything, I think I know how, but it dosn't work
channel.description:
I opened npcdrops and wanted my black knights to drop 100k so, I did this:
//--------NPCID---------DropType--------Item----Amount-- npcdrop = 178 4 0995 100000
(there is more, but it's just to show) Is there somthing wrong with it? Can anyone help me. :(
Please and Thank You, Hiyakimaru

item.title: My monsters won't drop anything, I think I know how, but it dosn't work

@hiyakimaru wrote:

Oh…I’m sure it’s easy…I’l sing a song to anyone that helps me.
